entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DatePicker and TimePicker opened unexpectedly when navigating back to previous page on Android API 21 and 23 #8130
  • IsVisible Not Render or Update from IsVisible = False to True. #8129
  • Review the performance implications of using a Concurrent Dictionary inside WrappedServiceProvider #8128
    .NET 7
  • [WinUI] Error deploying Sample.SingleProject in MainPage.xaml, "A cycle occurred while laying out the GUI." #8126
    6.0-sr2
  • Allow use of UITableViewStyle.GroupedInset style with TableView/ListView #8124
  • Navigation.PushAsync(); on windows platform throws exception: Catastrophic failure (0x8000FFFF (E_UNEXPECTED)) with same page instance #8123
  • Generics Serialization using Json.NET throws "Attempting to JIT compile method '(wrapper delegate-invoke)' while running in aot-only mode" in signed release build iOS-applications #8122
  • TapGestureRecognizer doesn't fire Tapped event on child controls #8121
  • Investigate converting all event subscriptions in our iOS handlers to delegates or our own delegates #8119
    6.0-sr3
  • Label italic width incorrect #8118
  • RadioButton on Windows not respecting margin #8116
  • Error "The specified deps.json ... does not exist" #8114
  • ScrollView does not scrollable to the End after window height resized. #8113
  • ListView doesn´t show separators between list items in Windows, but it does show on Android. iOS?? #8112
  • Frame.Background LinearGradientBrush not working on maccatalyst #8108
  • Grid with HeightRequest=0 no longer hides child elements #8105
  • Tabs within the shell do not execute override the OnAppearing method #8102
  • [Android] ObjectDisposedException 'AndroidX.AppCompat.View.Menu.MenuItemImpl' Modifying Shell Items #8101
  • Very Poor Performance in MAUI Android #8098
  • `CollectionView` requires `ScrollView` #8097

Closed

  • .NET MAUI in Visual Studio 2022 for Mac Preview #8127
  • AOT compiler not found when building for iOS #8106
  • Windows app maximum #8100
  • GestureRecognizers #7466
  • Application crashes on Startup if installed as MSIX package #7473
  • System.MissingMethodException: No parameterless constructor defined for type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Handlers.Compatibility.FrameRenderer' #7566
    6.0-sr2
  • [IOS] Launch performance #7687
  • DASH.js in BlazorWebView errors with 'MediaSource is not supported'. Works under Windows. #7909
  • CSS isolation not working in MAUI Blazor Hybrid for Windows when the assembly name is changed #8103
  • Error DEP0700: Registration of the app failed #7825
  • .net MAUI debugging -> GetCurrentDirectory() points to C:\windows\system32 #8091
  • Labels do not resize/reflow on Android when text is changed #8104
  • .net MAUI, Cannot create a log file in AppData/Roaming or AppData/Local #8090
  • How to select Maui version #8109
  • Shell.Set Presentation Mode bug - Android #8110
  • MAUI needs easy way to call a method like with UWP's "x:Bind" #7713
  • Unable to build iOS Binding Library wrapping iOS Framework Native Reference #8000
  • Build fails if app references library which contains framework library inside #7980
  • Target platform identifier android not recognized (6.0.400-preview.22301.10) #8072
  • Visual Studio 2022 17.0.3 Preview 1.0 change color icons in Maui to black. #8092
  • The "Xamarin.Android.Support.BuildTasks.VerifyVersionsTask" #8093
  • MSB4018 The "GenerateShims" task failed unexpectedly on MauiCheck #8094
  • Maui - No Capabilities Shown in Windows Manifest #8082
  • Maui Sample with errors NU1012 and NETSDK1139 #8081
  • Cannot create MAUI App Shell project #8080
  • Backgroundcolor of Radiobutton is wrong in .net MAUI. #8083
  • [Maui]Not able to Debug MAUI apps when using Net6.0 Tizen #8075
  • Frame Property "IsVisible" not being properly displayed when changing Boolean value to true in backend C# when initialized False in XAML #8084
  • Platform Independent Solution for MAUI WebView Control #8085
  • Directory.CreateDirectory does not work in Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2022 (64-bit) - Preview Version 17.3.0 Preview 1.0 #8089
  • Issue with OnPlatform in Maui #8073
  • Entry, Date Picker Control Unfocused Event Not Executing #8099
  • [Bug] Xamarin Page and View Templates break MAUI Apps #3200
    .NET 7
  • Pair to Mac fails on VS 2022 17.3.0 Preview 2.0 / 6.0.400 #8065
  • No output from console.Writeline or Logger.LogInformation in MAUI App #6941
    .NET 7
  • VSCode/CLI Support for running MAUI apps on Windows just like Mac #7659
  • cannot install maui main - Workload.Mono.ToolChain.Manifest missing signature #6470
    6.0-servicing
  • How to use Razor Component Library with .Net MAUI #6194
    Future
  • the following workloads must be installed: maccatalyst #6496
    .NET 7
  • MAUI Templates are missing in VS 2022 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #7819
  • No Maui Project Template and error: Platform version is not present for one or more target frameworks #5778
    6.0-servicing
  • New Page Feature in Visual Studio need update #6213
    6.0-servicing
  • .NET MAUI Templates not showing up - Windows 11, Visual Studio 2022 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #8076
  • MAUI "type or namespace name 'Application' could not be found" VS2022 Community 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #8077
  • Suggest alternative actions when MAUI Templates are not installed with VS 2022 Preview 6.0 #7185
  • I installed the MAUI workload, but I don't see New Maui project option in VS17.3.0 #7041
  • MAUI Templates missing from Visual Studio 2022 Preview 17.3 on macOS #7958
  • No maui template in list #7661
  • iOS startup time of application #6894
    6.0-servicing
  • [BUG IOS] Cancel prompt in WebView will crash the app #7541
    6.0-sr2
  • How can I build Universal 2 Mac builds? #7725

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Modal Navigation with Shell #8117
    area/shell 🐢
  • [X] Warn on setting Obsolete properties from Xaml #8111
    area/Xaml </>
  • Update the Windows App SDK #8107
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0-sr2

Merged

  • [core] use Lazy<T> for MauiContext properties #8033
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8058
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8052
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8059
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Use the correct define (NET6_0_OR_GREATER) #8086
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/architecture, 6.0-sr2
  • Update Development Notes to the latest #8070
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Backport main to net7.0 #7908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [android] avoid View.Context where unecessary #8001
    area/perf 🏎️, 6.0-sr2
  • [essentials] use Lazy<T> for Android application-wide values #7996
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0-sr2

Updated

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8053
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 #8054
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1210.39 to 1.0.1245.22 #8055
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8056
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8060
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8057
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, .NET 7
  • Fix GridLayoutManager Layout calculation #7712
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, 6.0-sr2
  • Unit tests for FlexLayoutManager #6800
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, 6.0-servicing
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, community ✨, 6.0-servicing
  • Remove the extra lines in the error message for better viewing #8069
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr2
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Explicitly set bounds for iOS ScrollView content holder #8002
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Update Entry behavior closing the Keyboard #7635
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • Add MauiUIApplicationDelegate.PerformFetch #7982
    .NET 7
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7913
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
